text: Life Is Sweet is a 1990 British comedy-drama movie directed by Mike Leigh and starring Alison Steadman, Jim Broadbent, Jane Horrocks, Claire Skinner, Timothy Spall, Stephen Rea, Glyn Owen, David Thewlis, Moya Brady. It was distributed by Palace Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1990 comedy- drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mike Leigh Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in the 1990s
title: Life Is Sweet (movie)
